New world - Emiway Bantai, Snoop Dogg & Lexz Pryde Lyrics New world is Emiway Bantai Latest song. Emiway Bantai, Lexz Pryde, and Snoop Dogg sing the new song “New World". New World video song featuring Emiway Bantai, Lexz Pryde and Snoop Dogg. Music of the song is given by Emiway Bantai whereas New World lyrics are written by Emiway Bantai, Lexz Pryde, and Snoop Dogg.
